code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{deleteContact}from"../api/ContactService";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Contact=_ref=>{let{contact,deleteContact}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"contact__item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/contacts/".concat(contact.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact__header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"contact__image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:contact.photoUrl,alt:contact.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact__details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"contact_name",children:[contact.name.substring(0,15)," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"contact_title",children:contact.title})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact__body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-envelope"})," ",contact.email.substring(0,20)," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-geo"})," ",contact.address]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-telephone"})," ",contact.phone]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[contact.status==="Active"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-check-circle"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-x-circle"})," ",contact.status]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteContact(contact.id),className:"delete-button",children:"Delete"})]});};export default Contact;
